Title: American Relief Agency - Report on American relief work. 1
Notes: As part of the US$275 million agreement that was signed on 3 July 1948, the US provided 197,707 ton of grain and foodstuffs, part of which is being unloaded here.Nr. 1 of the poster set on the Economic Aid Agreement between the United States of America and the Republic of China (3 July 1948).
